column1: Baby Barnaby's////Stopped in here to fortify myself this morning and it was an all around pleasant experience. I really can't stand the phrase "the warm fuzzies"
column2: but it applies here. Â This is one of the few joints in my 'hood where it truly feels neighborly
column3: the wait staff are super friendly
column4: and the green eggs and those fried potatoes are still shut yo' mouth good.
